thread.title: Deziray
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Deziray

author: Deziray
title: Deziray
text: I had a great experience, no complaints. Katie was super helpful and personable, got me financed really quickly and helped me pick out what I needed. Paperwork was a breeze and a manager helped save me the last loveseat they had in stock that matched my set which was super appreciated, otherwise I would have had to wait until next month! I really have to credit my wonderful experience to Katie she was beyond five stars.
